items.sentence: How did a nice guy like you get in a mess like this?
How did you manage to talk Tom into working for you?
How do you punish your children when they misbehave?
Tom says he doesn\'t feel like playing tennis today.
Tom says he doesn\'t really want to talk about this.
Tom says he doesn\'t want to live like that anymore.
Tom says he doesn\'t want to live like this anymore.
Tom says he still doesn\'t have everything he needs.
Tom said he didn\'t know what he was supposed to do.
Today\'s math class was more interesting than usual.
